Description:
Manage IT applications, operations, service requests, network, and security for assigned Business Units
Ensure corporate IT policies & Procedures are implemented in BUs and adhered to for compliance purposes.
Ensure Oracle Fusion ERP and other business critical applications are implemented efficiently for the assigned Business Units.
Overseeing the annual IT budget and ensuring cost-effectiveness.
Monitoring daily operations, including server hardware, software, printing and operating systems.
Coordinating technology installations, upgrades, and maintenance.
Selecting and purchasing new and replacement hardware and software, when necessary.
Testing, troubleshooting, and modifying information systems so that they operate effectively.
Generating performance reports for operating systems.
Assuring all IT activities are performed within the parameters of applicable laws, codes, and regulations.
Evaluating technology risks to develop a system & network disaster recovery plan and backup procedures.
Remaining up to date with advances in technology and industry best practices.
Responsible for administration, licensing and deployment of new and existing services that are part of the Office 365 platform.
Responsible for assuring the operational security, integrity, maintenance, and governance of Office 365 and SharePoint environments, MS-Teams, OneDrive for Business, Intune, and Azure Active Directory.
Responsible for configuration and use of the Microsoft Teams Collaboration Suite and SharePoint Online,
Responsible for the creation, deployment and maintenance of standardised IT policies based on industry best practice.
Training and educating end-users on IT applications including but not limited to Oracle Fusion, Manufacturing plant applications, O365 capabilities, and collaboration tools (OneDrive, Teams, Outlook etc).
Support end-users by troubleshooting Office 365 & SharePoint services and performance issues on PCs, Macs, and mobile devices in a timely and professional manner.
Ensure all changes are made in accordance with change control, security, and risk assessment policies.
Experience utilizing various backup software in a cloud environment. Ability to review troubleshoot and restore systems from backup software as needed.
Maintains a working knowledge of continuing developments in the field of Computer Security.
Analyses information and evaluates results to recommend process improvements, choose effective solutions, and solve problems.
Conduct routine monitoring and analysis to include audit log reports evaluation, system and storage utilization reports, site and system usage, growth reports, and manage site collection quota settings
Builds positive customer relationships and works with clients to understand and respond to issues.
Investigates and provides solutions to issues, incidents, and problemsSkills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, software engineering, or a related field.
At least 10 years of experience in managing IT infrastructure and services, preferably for manufacturing industry.
Experience with computer networks, network administration, and network installation.
Proficient in computer hardware, cabling installation and support, wireless technology applications and interface, and IT security.
Proficient in Office 365 collaboration and productivity tools.
Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
Ability to take direction and perform at a high level with autonomy.
Experience in configuration, troubleshooting and support of Office 365 Online, SharePoint Online, Teams, OneDrive for Business, and Intune. Must have completed at least two deployments.
Strong knowledge of Microsoft Office 365 Exchange and the interaction with Active Directory
Effective organizational skills to meet schedules and timelines. Specifically, must be able to work independently and produce deliverables to management deadlines.
Must be able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and balance priorities with good time management skills.
Strong coordination and planning skills with the ability to effectively prioritize tasks and work independently with minimal supervision.
Demonstrated ability to work in a collaborative team environment.
Good verbal and written communications skills. Ability to communicate and interact effectively with all levels
Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to creatively challenge current methods and procedures.
Independent learner and self-directed; takes the initiative while working within a team context.
Must enjoy researching new technologies, learning, and expanding one’s knowledge.
Resilient and adaptive.
Good organizational skills.
Work independently with a degree of responsibility.
Ability to effectively prioritize and multi-task in a fast-paced environment
Forward-thinking and inclusive.
